channel.description: Recent content on Vamsi Krishna B

item.title: Elixir - Mix Aliases to simpify your Ecto workflow
item.description: There are some cases where you run a sequence of mix tasks one after another. Here’s an example: mix ecto.create mix ecto.migrate mix run priv/repo/seeds.exs he above commands create the database, run all your migrations and load the fixtures for you respectively. Wouldn’t it be easier to just run one command and in turn that wraps all the three mix tasks into a single command? Enter mix Aliases. from the official docs:

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World! again! This is not the first time I have written this post. I have created the same post at least 4 or 5 times. After many attempts at creating and maintaining a blog, here I am again creating yet another hello world post! What’s new this time? All the previous instances, I have either used a CMS like WordPress or I have used something that I built from scratch.
